ghost.description: make background transparent and invert text and border colors, added in 2.7
ghost.description_zh: 幽灵属性，使按钮背景透明

htmlType.description: set the original html type of button, see: MDN
htmlType.description_zh: 设置 button 原生的 type 值，可选值请参考 HTML 标准

icon.description: set the icon of button, see: Icon component

loading.description: set the loading status of button

shape.description: can be set to circle, round or omitted
shape.description_zh: 设置按钮形状，可选值为 `circle`、 `round` 或者不设

size.description: can be set to small large or omitted
size.description_zh: 设置按钮大小，可选值为 small large 或者不设

type.description: can be set to primary ghost dashed danger link or omitted (meaning default)
type.description_zh: 设置按钮类型，可选值为 `primary` `dashed` `danger` `link` 或者不设

block.description: option to fit button width to its parent width
block.description_zh: 将按钮宽度调整为其父宽度的选项

events.name: click
events.description: set the handler to handle click event
